forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Remaining cloudy. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain...mainly this evening. Thunder possible. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
